```{r}
library(lubridate)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
songs_data_raw = read_csv(file = "../data/raw/raw_dataset.csv", 
                          col_types = list("c", "c", "f", "c", "c", "d", "d", "f",
                                 "d", "f", "d", "d", "d", "d", "d", "d", "f", "d", "f"))
```


```{r}
# we remove the na from the dataset
songs_data = songs_data_raw %>%
              na.omit()  %>%
              select(-artist_id, -track_id) 
```


```{r}
# write cleaned data to file
write_tsv(songs_data, file = "../data/clean/songs_data.tsv")
```
